useCase.name: Display rooms list of an EnergyGrid

mainSequence.step: Admin displays the rooms list of an EnergyGrid in the MainUI.
MainUI displays the rooms list of an EnergyGrid in the HouseConfigurationUI.
Admin requests the Geographic Area Name in the HouseConfigurationUI.
Admin inserts the Geographic Area name in the MainUI.
MainUI sets the Geographic Area name in the HouseConfigurationUI.
HouseConfigurationController checks if the name is contained in the list.
GeographicAreaList checks if the name is contained in the list.
GeographicArea matches the name and validates the data.
HouseConfigurationUI sets the data for the Geographic Area.
Admin requests the House Name in the HouseConfigurationUI.
Admin inserts the House name in the MainUI.
MainUI sets the House name in the HouseConfigurationUI.
HouseConfigurationController checks if the name is contained in the list.
HouseList checks if the name is contained in the list.
House matches the name and validates the data.
HouseConfigurationUI sets the data for the House.
Admin requests the Energy Grid Name in the HouseConfigurationUI.
Admin inserts the Energy Grid Name in the MainUI.
MainUI sets the Energy Grid Name in the HouseConfigurationUI.
HouseConfigurationController checks if the name is contained in the list.
EnergyGridList checks if the name is contained in the list.
EnergyGrid matches the name and validates the data.
HouseConfigurationUI sets the data for the Energy Grid.
HouseConfigurationController gets the Room list from the EnergyGrid.
EnergyGrid gets the RoomList.
RoomList validates the data and builds a String.
HouseConfigurationUI displays the list of rooms of the EnergyGrid to Admin.
